name: Lin Lin

ski.name: BOOM GOES THE DRUM!
desc: in Lin plays his spirit drum, sending a burst of sound to a target area after a short delay to deal magical damage. Upgrade: increases damage and range while stunning for 1s.

ski.name: SUPERSONIC WAVE
desc: Lin Lin creates a sound wave that deals magical damage and slows movement for enemies caught in its path. Upgrade: increases damage dealt and slowdown.
data: Upgrade: Increased Slowdown: 3s, Increased Flat Damage: 7%/11%/15%/19%
study: Deals magical damage and causes Movement Slow

ski.name: HIGH FIDELITY
desc: Releases a high fidelity sound wave at up to 5 target enemies, dealing 4 continuous blows of magical damage. Each hit triggers one Reverberation effect. Upgrade: causes Chaos to targets
study: Deals damage to all enemy heroes

ski.name: REVERBERATION
desc: Each ability cast by Lin Lin deals magical damage to surrounding enemy units while restoring her health. Casting Reverberation upgrades next ability cast within 3 seconds, while increasing movement speed.

story: Who knew that a virus lay inside this AI virtual reality singer, and her programmers intended to conquer the world with her. For her songs, once heard, implanted a neural seed inside listeners. The plot failed because Lin Lin had created her own soul who wanted to protect the humans.
